text: Here you'll find an overview of what we covered during the course.
You can use this to review quickly and easily what you learnt with me.
But you won't need to listen to any of the explanations again or any of the long pauses.
Instead, there will be myself and Marion who will speak the language at a more normal speed as you'd perhaps find it in France.
The Review CD goes at quite a pace, so if you need to, use your pause button and stop the recording whilst you think out your response.
As before, I'll prompt you with English and you should respond using French.
